title: A shirtless Chris Hemsworth turns up the heat with his gruelling workout regimen
text:
He found worldwide fame playing Thor, and on Friday, Chris Hemsworth gave his fans at glimpse at just what it takes to look like a god.

The 36-year-old Hollywood star shared a series of videos of himself enduring a punishing workout on Instagram.

But the circuit is clearly not for the faint-hearted, with the buff actor appearing red and sweaty, his bulging muscles straining.

Scroll down for video

Pushed to the limit: He found worldwide fame playing Thor, and on Friday, Chris Hemsworth gave his fans at glimpse at just what it takes to look like a god

A shirtless Chris begins by lifting two 50 pound dumbbells - 22.7 kilos each - up and down, while squatting on a grassy soccer pitch.

At first lifting them one at a time, he then builds to lifting them both simultaneously.

He then walks them over to another area of the grass, before dropping them on the ground and picking up another set of dumbbells, this time weighing in at 35 pounds - 15.9 kilos each.

No pain, no gain: The 36-year-old Hollywood star shared a series of videos of himself enduring a punishing workout on Instagram

Hard work: The circuit is clearly not for the faint-hearted, with the buff actor appearing red and sweaty, his bulging muscles straining

'It was so hot my shirt literally burst into flames, luckily I was wearing my favourite pair of fire retardant shorts,' he jokingly captioned the videos

The hunky actor is then seen lifting both dumbbells up and over his head, before tossing them back onto the ground.

He then embarks on a sprint down the length of the yard, and after finishing, turns to the camera and triumphantly pats his chest.

Throughout the gruelling exercise regimen, Chris could be heard panting and grunting.

Heavy lifting: A shirtless Chris begins by lifting two 50 pound dumbbells - 22.7 kilos each - up and down, while squatting on a grassy soccer pitch

Let it out: Throughout the gruelling exercise regimen, Chris could be heard panting and grunting

Run, Thor, run: He then embarks on a sprint down the length of the yard, and after finishing, turns to the camera and triumphantly pats his chest

'It was so hot my shirt literally burst into flames, luckily I was wearing my favourite pair of fire retardant shorts,' he jokingly captioned the videos.

And he encouraged any masochistic fans wanting to play along at home to 'give this circuit a go 6 times through'.

The intensive workout appears to be one of the exercise regimens on offer on Chris' new fitness app, Centr, with the actor posting a link to the app's Instagram page.
